name: Group Repeating Fractions
description:
Write ```javascript function repeatingFractions(numerator, denominator) ``` ```python function repeating_fractions(numerator, denominator) ``` ```ruby function repeating_fractions(numerator, denominator) ``` that given two numbers representing the numerator and denominator of a fraction, return the fraction in string format. If the fractional part has repeated digits, replace those digits with a single digit in parentheses.
For example: ```javascript repeatingFractions(1,1) === '1' repeatingFractions(1,3) === '0.(3)' repeatingFractions(2,888) === '0.(0)(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)' ``` ```python repeating_fractions(1,1) === '1' repeating_fractions(1,3) === '0.(3)' repeating_fractions(2,888) === '0.(0)(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)' ``` ```ruby repeating_fractions(1,1) === '1' repeating_fractions(1,3) === '0.(3)' repeating_fractions(2,888) === '0.(0)(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)5(2)' ```
